data.title: XDGMM: eXtreme Deconvolution Gaussian Mixture Modeling
data.name: XDGMM
data.description: A wrapper class for the scikit-learn BaseEstimator class that implements both the astroML and Bovy et al. (2011) XDGMM methods.

evidence: "This is a Python class for using Gaussian mixtures to do density estimation of noisy, heterogenous, and incomplete data... which is compatible with the scikit-learn machine learning methods." (indicates a library-style class to be used within other code)
"If you end up using any of the ideas or code in this repository in your own research, please cite Holoien, Marshall, & Wechsler (2016)." (shows it directly underpins research results)
"provide a link to this repo's URL: https://github.com/tholoien/XDGMM" (distribution via the GitHub source repository)
